ygData.subject: Permafrost king room
ygData.msgSnippet: I love this place, went here on saturday with 2 guild mates (43 monk, 36 druid and me, 38 bard). In an hour we got a Crystalline blade, Zaharns Coronet and I
ygData.messageBody:
I love this place, went here on saturday with 2 guild mates (43 monk, 36
druid and me, 38 bard). In an hour we got a Crystalline blade, Zaharns
Coronet and I kill the scryer and got an Ice crystal staff.

The incident that happened was when we was happily controlling the spawn in
the king room when two low 30's people came along, decided to run down
through the doors and trained 2 Giants (we had killed the diplomat). After
killing both these people they came for me. I tried to make a runner but
only got to the flag room.

I was so angry, these 2 idiots came along and ruined my fun, luckily a
level 48 cleric was in Everfrost and agreed to res me for free (I still
gave him a serp bracer for his kindness). I was bound in Freeport so didn't
fancy running back to Perma from there.

This also shows that bard song taunts have not been reduced, god knows how
but we was near the top of the king room and the giants killed the 2 guys
down near the King spawn and the giants still came for me.

Enough of my rant, I got the exp back and am now level 39. Also won roll on
Mithril Breastplate last night, on testing it I notice that when worn
compared to the Lambent BP it gives 8 less hp's and 2 less ac points than
Lambent but the +15 Agi is nice. I really like the look of the mithril
whilst in dark elf form too.

Madagan Songweaver, Bard of 39 songs <Guardians of Light>
Veeshan Server
